about_the_game:
Thank You For Purchasing Our Game!


To show our appreciation for all your great support, we created this Wallpaper Set especially for you to download. We hope you all like it!

Wallpapers


A Set of 6 Wallpapers to enhance your desktop with premium look Artwork made exclusively for you to feel part of our team:
  • 4K (3840 x 2160);
  • Ultra Wide (2560 x 1080);

Accessing The DLC

After downloading Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match - Wallpapers,
you can access the content in the game's directory folder.
Here are the steps to access the files:

  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match game directory, which has the "HP_SM_Wallpaper_set" folder included in it.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match - Wallpapers
short_description: A Set of 6 Wallpapers in 4K and Ultra Wide dimensions, made exclusively for you to feel part of our team ;)
